movie.title: Ruby Sparks
movie.description_intro: Calvin is a genius novelist who begins to type a new novel on his manual typewriter about Ruby, his dream girl. He can't believe his eyes, because the next day, Ruby becomes a real person, and they begin to have a beautiful relationship together. If the relationship isn't perfect, all Calvin has to do is simply type the words on the page and Ruby's actions change to what he needs.
movie.description_full: Calvin is a genius novelist who begins to type a new novel on his manual typewriter about Ruby, his dream girl. He can't believe his eyes, because the next day, Ruby becomes a real person, and they begin to have a beautiful relationship together. If the relationship isn't perfect, all Calvin has to do is simply type the words on the page and Ruby's actions change to what he needs.

movies.title: Hide
movies.summary: A Boston detective investigates the mummified remains of six women, based on a novel by Lisa Gardner.
movies.description_full: A Boston detective investigates the mummified remains of six women, based on a novel by Lisa Gardner.
movies.synopsis: A Boston detective investigates the mummified remains of six women, based on a novel by Lisa Gardner.

movies.title: Martial Law
movies.summary: When it comes to maximum law enforcement, only police officers Sean Thompson and Billie Blake can deliver the power of justice...with their bare hands. Sean and Billie's talents in karate as well as their knowledge of the criminal underworld will be put to the test when they find themselves on a collision course with Dalton Rhoades, a criminal mastermind who runs a cartel-for-hire business, using his dojo as a front for his illegal activities and recruiting new talent. In addition to being a career criminal, Rhodes is also a master at rare forms of kung fu and the last practitioner of the deadly 'dim-mak' (death touch) technique. When Sean's troublesome baby brother Michael falls in with Rhodes' crowd and becomes a victim of their murderous exploits, the police duo will be forced to take the law into their own hands as their fight with Rhodes and his criminal empire gets very personal.

movies.title: Avenger Dogs
movies.summary: When the universe's highest-flying dogs warp into outer space, Skyfetcher and Spaceslobber get a call from canine headquarters! It seems an unknown force is attacking unsuspecting planets, and it's up to them to root out the source of the trouble!

movies.title: The Rose on His Arm
movies.summary: A young man ignores his mother's pleas and becomes drawn to a life of crime.
movies.description_full: A young man ignores his mother's pleas and becomes drawn to a life of crime.
movies.synopsis: A young man ignores his mother's pleas and becomes drawn to a life of crime.
